languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мастер Херимон, приставленный вашим приказом к капелле для проведения ритуала, уже завершает подготовку".
languages.translation_comment: Если наняли специального псайкера по рекомендации Вайса
Если наняли специального псайкера по рекомендации Вайса

languages.text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мастер Херимон, приставленный вашим приказом к капелле для проведения ритуала, уже завершает подготовку".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations."
"Lord Captain! Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations."

"Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «El maestro Herimon, asignado a la capilla para la realización del ritual bajo sus órdenes, casi ha concluido con sus preparativos, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «El maestro Herimon, asignado a la capilla para la realización del ritual bajo sus órdenes, casi ha concluido con sus preparativos, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「マスター・ヘリモンは、儀式を執り行うために、あなたの命令で礼拝堂に配属された。準備はもうすぐ終わるぞ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヘリモンは、儀式を執り行うために、あなたの命令で礼拝堂に配属された。準備はもうすぐ終わるぞ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “奉您的命令，赫瑞蒙大师已经前往礼拜堂，准备进行仪式。他的准备工作已经差不多都完成了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “奉您的命令，赫瑞蒙大师已经前往礼拜堂，准备进行仪式。他的准备工作已经差不多都完成了，舰长大人。”

languages.text: "Meister Herimon, der auf Euren Befehl hin der Kapelle zugewiesen wurde, um das Ritual auszuführen, hat seine Vorbereitungen fast abgeschlossen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Herimon, der auf Euren Befehl hin der Kapelle zugewiesen wurde, um das Ritual auszuführen, hat seine Vorbereitungen fast abgeschlossen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Maître Hérimon, affecté sur votre ordre à la chapelle pour mener à bien le rituel, a presque terminé ses préparatifs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Maître Hérimon, affecté sur votre ordre à la chapelle pour mener à bien le rituel, a presque terminé ses préparatifs, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Emirleriniz üzerine ayini gerçekleştirmek amacıyla şapelde göreve getirilen Üstat Herimon, hazırlıklarını bitirmek üzere Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Master Herimon, assigned to the chapel upon your orders for the purposes of performing the ritual, has almost finished his preparations, Lord Captain."
